text: satyavisvasam svikarikkukayum ‎salkkarmannalanusthikkukayum ceyyunnavare ‎subhavartta ariyikkuka: avarkk talbhagattute ‎aruvikalealukunna svargiyaramannalunt. atile ‎kanikal aharamayi labhikkumpealeakke avar ‎parayum: "nannalkku neratte nalkiyatu ‎tanneyanallea itum." satyamea, samanatayullat ‎avarkk sam'manikkappetukayan. avarkkavite ‎visud'dharaya inakalunt. avaravite ‎sthiravasikalayirikkum. ‎
